notesStmt.note: Liquid spills. Damp and mould staining. Usage stains, dirt at ends. Glue stains at gutter. Intermittent rodent damage at edges.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

collation.p:
56 quires: i4 (folios 1-2, 2a, 3), ii8-1 (folios 4-11, folios 7 and 7a is a paper bifolium, not part of the original quire), iii8 (folios 12-19), iv8-1 (folios 20-26), v-xlii8 (folios 27-322), xliii8-6 (folios 323-324), xliv-xlv8 (folios 325-340), xlvi8-6 (folios 341-342), xlvii-l8 (folios 343-374), li8-7 (folio 375), lii8-1 (folios 376-382), liii8-1 (folios 383-389), liv-lv8 (folios 390-405), lvi4 (folios 406-409).
Catchwords on every verso, and Hebrew quire numbering from folio 19v.
